definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]

sentences.english: He can hairpin any door open.
sentences.chinese: 他可以用髮夾打開任何門上的鎖。

sentences.english: It never obeys barrettes or bands.
sentences.chinese: 它從來不聽髮夾和髮帶的話。

sentences.english: I borrowed a barrette from my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我向姐姐借了一個髮夾。

sentences.english: When no one’s looking, pop open the control-panel hatch with a paper clip or bobby pin.
sentences.chinese: 沒人注意的時候，用紙夾或髮夾迅速打開控制板。

sentences.english: A dip phosphating process for hairpins was forwarded.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一室多用髮夾浸磷磷化工藝。

sentences.english: Soft PVC: This series of artworks including mobile phone stander.
sentences.chinese: 此糸的產品包括手機座，手機繩，髮夾。

sentences.english: There is always a star shape barrette on your hair.
sentences.chinese: 你的頭髮上總有一個星形髮夾。

sentences.english: Girls always like these Japanese-style hair clips.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子都喜歡這些日本風格的髮夾。

sentences.english: Long hair should comb up, hair clips and ribbon should not colorful.
sentences.chinese: 長髮須盤起來，髮帶髮夾顏色不可過於亮麗。

sentences.english: Many of the hairpins are different varieties of plastic flowers.
sentences.chinese: 很多髮夾是不同種類的塑料花。

sentences.english: I have seen a lot of women have hairpins, earrings, bracelets and rings.
sentences.chinese: 我看見很多女性戴髮夾，耳環，手鐲和戒指。

sentences.english: The price of these hairpins are about the same.
sentences.chinese: 這些髮夾的價格大致相網。

sentences.english: Do not transport and store the battery together with metal objects such as necklaces, hairpins etc.
sentences.chinese: 禁止將電池與金屬，如髮夾，項鍊等一起運輸或貯存。

sentences.english: So the king gives a hundred hairpins to each of them.
sentences.chinese: 所以國王送給她們每人一百個漂亮的髮夾。

sentences.english: Can form a terminating hairpin structure that stops transcription of the operon.
sentences.chinese: 能形成終止型髮夾結構而使在操縱子進行的轉錄停止。

definition: richly bedecked/dripping with gold and silver (idiom)
weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner
